events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a full refund.
The customer's concern has been noted as a refund request due to product not fitting.
Support agent Jane T. has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your issue. I'm happy to assist you with your return and refund today.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm the condition of the jacket? This will help us process your refund faster.
The order number is 4587920. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, and never worn outside.
Thanks for the details. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we'll email you shortly, and once received, we will issue a full refund within 5 business days.
Great, thank you for your quick response and for providing the return label. I appreciate the help.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. You should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing your case now. Thank you for contacting us.
